title: Monsanto 's number of regular and temporary workers worldwide 2013 to 2017
summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 2 different Worker Types for 5 groups 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, and 2017 that are presented on the X-axis.
In Worker Type Regular workers, 2015 had the highest SOME LABEL 22500.0 among the 5 groups and in Temporary workers, 2017 had the lowest SOME LABEL 2800.0.
Among all the Worker Types, 2017 had the highest SOME LABEL 20500.0 in Worker Type Regular workers and lowest value 2800.0 in Worker Type Temporary workers.
The maximum SOME LABEL for 2017 that was found in Worker Type Regular workers was 7.32 times larger than the minimum SOME LABEL observed in Worker Type Temporary workers.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 2 different Worker Types on X-axis for 5 groups 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, and 2017. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
Worker Type Regular workers had the maximum SOME LABEL among all 5 groups, and it was for 2015. The minimum SOME LABEL was observed in Worker Type Temporary workers for 2017.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 2 different Worker Types for 5 groups 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, and 2017 that are presented on the X-axis.
In Worker Type Regular workers, 2015 had the highest SOME LABEL 22500.0 among the 5 groups and in Temporary workers, 2017 had the lowest SOME LABEL 2800.0.
Among all the Worker Types, 2017 had the highest SOME LABEL 20500.0 in Worker Type Regular workers and lowest value 2800.0 in Worker Type Temporary workers.
The maximum SOME LABEL for 2017 that was found in Worker Type Regular workers was 7.32 times larger than the minimum SOME LABEL observed in Worker Type Temporary workers.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 2 different Worker Types for 5 groups 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, and 2017 that are presented on the X-axis.
Worker Type Regular workers had the maximum SOME LABEL among all 5 groups, and it was for 2015. The minimum SOME LABEL was observed in Worker Type Temporary workers for 2017.
Among all the Worker Types, 2017 had the highest SOME LABEL 20500.0 in Worker Type Regular workers and lowest value 2800.0 in Worker Type Temporary workers.
There is a gap of 17700.0 between the highest and lowest SOME LABEL found for 2017 in Worker Type Regular workers and Temporary workers.
Out of all 5 groups, the highest gap between the maximum and minimum SOME LABEL was found in case of 2015.
2015 had the maximum SOME LABEL out of all 5 groups in Worker Type Regular workers followed by 2015 in Regular workers, and the minimum SOME LABEL is found for 2017 in Temporary workers.
Averaging all 5 groups 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, and 2017, the Worker Type Regular workers is the maximum SOME LABEL and Temporary workers is the minimum SOME LABEL.
